summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing for FG Stock & Dispatch Optimizer dashboard layout alignment. Successfully fixed AI Insights sidebar alignment issue and verified all dashboard components are working correctly.

design_issues.note: May be expected behavior with mock data services

passed_tests: AI Insights sidebar aligned perfectly with KPI cards (0px difference)
Sidebar width is correct (~320px as designed)
Main content uses proper proportions (~80% main, ~20% sidebar)
All 6 KPI cards display horizontally in proper grid
Both mini grids (Non-Moving, Fast-Moving) show 4 items each as expected
Charts section displays 2 charts correctly (Stock vs Dispatch, Stock Ageing)
Data grids section shows both tables (Pending Orders, FG Stock Ageing)
Professional ERP layout achieved with consistent alignment
Responsive design works correctly on tablet (switches to vertical layout)
No JavaScript errors or console warnings
success_percentage: frontend: 95% (1 minor design issue with Live badge status)
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor: Live badge shows 'Offline' instead of 'Live' - this may be expected behavior with mock APIs, but should be verified if real-time status indication is required
